website_summaries.verdict: A set of intricately designed, highly realistic decoys with weighted keels.
pros: This 12-pack includes birds with six head styles and extremely lifelike paint jobs
Heavy-duty and made with high-quality craftsmanship
cons: Putting the heads on the bodies takes effort and elbow grease

customer_reviews.title: Great Father's Day gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely LOVES these decoys!! The detail that these decoys have is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Most Realistic Decoys I’ve ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: These things are probably the most realistic decoy I’ve ever bought! Way better than my last set of decoys. I compared these to the stuffed mallard I had lying around. And these things are incredibly similar!
customer_reviews.author: Chase Cantrall

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive compared to the durability.
customer_reviews.text: Used 2 times and they are skinning up already. Way too expensive compared to the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE DECOYS
customer_reviews.text: Had mine for going on something like 4 years they are the best decoys you will ever buy. I've killed so many ducks over them and just beat them up and they still look brand new
customer_reviews.author: Dakota snelson

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny, right out of the box you can tell the quality of the decoys. They will look great in the spread this season.
customer_reviews.author: Zwallace

customer_reviews.title: ... bought these for my son for Christmas and he loved them. On his first two hunts he got ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for Christmas and he loved them. On his first two hunts he got two different ducks that were very rare to the area that was very exciting. Quality made and great detail. Thanks for the amazing gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: TS Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly realistic. Not that hard to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Can't comment on durability yet; only used half a season. But they are gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Engle

customer_reviews.title: These are great decoys! The best I've seen sit on water ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great decoys! The best I've seen sit on water the ducks love them! Although you have to be careful with the flocked heads. I suggest to purchase a slotted decoy bag to keep the decoys looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Turner

customer_reviews.title: Best decoys on the market.
customer_reviews.text: While using these decoys for the past three years, I have come to like them better than any other brand I've seen or hunted with. Very life like look with great detail. The males' flocked heads are a great touch. But the most impressive thing about these decoys is, when other decoys are "dead in the water" on very calm/still days, these decoys still pick up a little air for movement to give your spread some life. I can't say enough good things about these decoys, except you need to go get some of your own.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Monahon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My son and husband said these are the best decoys ever. Much better quality than ones we have. Look very real and move very lifelike in pond where they currently are until they go duck hunting in couple days. Gave them to my son for Christmas yesterday. He also got an IPad mini and just asked me this morning if he could trade his IPad he received for another set of these decoys. Just ordered another dozen.......
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product and Company
customer_reviews.text: The best decoys I have ever seen. Super great pain job and unique head positions. Bough for son as Christmas present, one drake body was missing. The Dakota Decoy company was on it with in the hour of my e-mail to them. I will always purchase again from a company with this type of customer service. I look forward to next Christmas to purchase my son some Dakota pintail and teal decoys. Their superior products and service have earned them a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Badders

customer_reviews.title: I will stick to only buying these I absolutely loved them! late season birds would just lock up ...
customer_reviews.text: I will stick to only buying these I absolutely loved them! late season birds would just lock up when they saw them. if your deciding on these or avian x jus know he flocked heads make them way more realistic.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: They will look great this fall
customer_reviews.text: I have not used them yet but they will look Great this fall when I get the chance. The heads were not as difficult as some have said I just followed the installation directions and was done in about fifteen minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Selby

customer_reviews.title: seem to work well look awesome just need more ducks to test them on
customer_reviews.text: seem to work well look awesome just need more ducks to test them on. Very well constructed wish I could have ten dozen of them.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Works great floats pretty
customer_reviews.text: Works great floats pretty. Green heads get a lil beat up pretty fast due to the velvet on the heads. Other than that works great
customer_reviews.author: lance

customer_reviews.title: Bargain for the quality
customer_reviews.text: These decoys are realistic as I’ve seen. Flocked heads are great and should be super easy to add a coat as wear occurs. The flex body will lead to years of use I’m sure. Great job Dakota.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great decoy
customer_reviews.text: This is the first year Ive used these decoys and Ive had a huge improvement in bird coming in to the spread the price could be lower but they are a great decoy.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great supplier and product. This is the decoy setup to buy and arrived earlier than expected!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Here they come!
customer_reviews.text: End of the trail for me but going to hold out to the last and these decoys are a final elixir. Ducks, not only mallards, have swam or flown right into them (only using a dozen). So, they are what they are, a decoy of life-like proportion. Go get 'em; almost as good as my retrieving Chessie.
customer_reviews.author: dllewis

customer_reviews.title: Best Duck decoy on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Best decoy on the market, period. Paint is realistic and super durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Mallard decoy ever made
customer_reviews.text: Best Mallard decoy ever made. These are based off real carvings and it shows. For an ultra durable and detailed decoy look no further.
customer_reviews.author: C Beery

customer_reviews.title: Great Decoys
customer_reviews.text: I hunted over these decoys before and was made a believer. Unbelievable realism. Selling all my other duck decoys and investing in these decoys. They are a little more expensive, but worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bigmogoose

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: Great body positions. these float high in the water and stay upright. The mallards are weighted just right. The durability of the paint is amazing. I have never had any plastic issue like I did before I made the switch. And the customer service is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Yvon

product_meta.title: Dakota Decoy X-Treme Flocked Drake Head Mallards (12 Pack) 12120
product_meta.description: The first thing you will notice is the most life like, hand painted finish ever put on a hunting decoy. Our drakes go through a 24 step painting process, and our hens go through a 16 step painting process. This attention to detail is evident the minute you lay eyes on these decoys! Upon further inspection you will notice the 6 different head styles in each dozen. These multiple heads come attached to the decoy, but will spin a full 360 degrees, to give your spread the most realistic look ever achieved with decoys. These decoys are manufactured out of the same 60/40 blend of high and low density polyethylene that has been proven extra tough on our goose decoys. We are able to attain the most durable paint possible, to give you years of trouble free use. The decoys are slightly oversized, measuring 16” in length. They have a weighted keel designed with the hunter in mind. We’ve added a cleat to the front of the keel to lengthen or shorten lines to the desired depth of water. The decoys are packaged in dozen packs with 7 drakes with 4 unique head styles, and 5 hens with 2 head styles. One look at these and you’ll agree… duck hunting will never be the same.
feature_bullets: Multiple step painting process with attention to detail
Heads will spin 360 degrees for realistic look
Slightly oversized with a weighted keel
